H0.text: Which US singing duo started out under the names Caesar and Cleo. Marvin Gaye and Tammi Terrell

H1.text: Which US singing duo started out under the names Caesar and Cleo. John Legend and Chrissy Teigen

H2.text: Which US singing duo started out under the names Caesar and Cleo. Kenny Rogers and Dolly Parton

H3.text: Which US singing duo started out under the names Caesar and Cleo. Sonny & Cher

A4.text: With Bono continuing to write, arrange and produce the songs, the couple's first incarnation was as the duo 'Caesar and Cleo'.
